REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2908 reute r f BC-CHOCK-FULL-O'-NUTS-<C 06-18 0051

TEXT.TITLE: CHOCK FULL O' NUTS <CHF> SETS STOCK DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Chock Full O' Nuts Corp said its board declared a three pct stock dividend, payable July 31 to holders of record July Eight. The company also said Page M. Black has resigned from its board to devote her attention to charitable affairs. Reuter
